text: NГѓВєГѓВ±ez Will Serve as Campaign Co-Chair The Clinton Campaign today announced the endorsement of California Assembly Speaker Fabian NГѓВєГѓВ±ez and named him a co-chair of Hillary's campaign. "Senator Clinton is the experienced and visionary leader who is ready to lead us towards that change."
